meanings.definition: Feel intense or violent dislike for
meanings.sent1: She detests spiders and always screams when she sees one.
meanings.sent2: He detests waking up early on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The cat detests wearing the tiny hat but looks adorable in it.
meanings.sent4: His heart detests the idea of leaving his hometown.
meanings.sent5: The smell of rotten eggs detests everyone in the room.

meanings.sent1: My brother detests the taste of olives and refuses to eat them.
meanings.sent2: She detests the sound of nails on a chalkboard.
meanings.sent3: The grumpy old man detests the cheerful music playing next door.
meanings.sent4: Her mind detests the thought of failure.
meanings.sent5: The baby detests the taste of medicine and spits it out every time.
